info.label: Senior Solutions Architect
info.brief: Passionate **Solutions Architect**, and **OpenSource enthusiast** looking to solve complex business problems by lending my expertise on solution/application design, development, implementation, and support of business solutions using various technologies web, mobile, cloud, and open source. Currently working on next generation Omni channel micro services platform to leverage the power of cloud.

employment.summary: 10+ years industry IT and software development experience.

history.summary: Working on next generation Omni channel microservices platform to leverage the power of cloud.
highlights: Member of the architecture team responsible for redesigning our existing application as micro services. The new Platform is highly **scalable**, **reliable**, **extensible** and leverages the power of cloud
Design and develop **in-house frameworks** on top of EclipseLink, Apache Camel and other open source tools to support our persistence services, extensibility and scalability
Help the team with **code reviews, automated testing statergies, code quality** etc.
We use **SpringBoot** and **SpringCloud** to write these micro services. **Docker** for Containerization
We use AWS services like **ECS**, **EC2**, **Autoscaling**, **ELB** and other services to achieve our architecture requirements
**MySQL, MongoDB and ElasticSearch** as DataStore
Securing the microservices with **OAuth**
Automate the entire CI and QA pipeline using **Gradle, Jenkins and AWS CloudFormation**

history.summary: Member of Architecture team responsible for Application Architecture and Deployment
highlights: Managed a 5-person development team
Remove usage of J2EE technologies with Spring and other OpenSource technologies.
Deployed our application on pure web containers like Jetty and Tomcat
Help product team use the framework in the right way by proving consulting services on the framework that we use

Developed System Director which automates deployment and management of our application on Unix machines. Used [Jenkins Remoting Engine](https://github.com/jenkinsci/remoting) to communicate with multiple unix machines application installations. Helps user stop, start, apply patches and monitor application using a web interface.
Migrated all source code from Clearcase to Git; Conducted training session to ease the migration

history.summary: Developed framework for supporting our Supply Chain Process Platform.
highlights: Framework Owner of **Manhattan Data Services(MDS)** - wrapper on top of Hibernate to provide persistence service for Manhattan Applications.

Framework owner of **ILSRuntime** - responsible for initializing all basic services like Caching, Persistence, JMS, Transaction, Security, Spring, reporting and then loading all manhattan modules based on the installed license.
Enhanced **Manhattan Reporting Framework** to support high volume printing
Responsible for the Build and Deployment framework which automates deployment of all manhattan products. The tools is written using Apache Ant, Shell and Batch script
Removed EJB's and MDB's and replaced them with Spring Transactions and MDP's
Increased the usage of Spring beans across all manhattan products
Developed and maintained build and deployment script using Apache Ant and shell
Responsible Version control, branching strategy, release engineering
Responsible for defect fixing and enhancements in framework libraries
Setup and maintain QA and development integration environment
Added support for deployment manhattan application in JBoss and Weblogic application servers

education.summary: Chemical engineer from National Institute of Technology

history.institution: National Institute of Technology, Trichy, Tamilnadu, India
history.title: B.Tech

testimonials.name: Ekta Agarwal
testimonials.quote: I have been working with Palani for close to two years now and he never fails to amaze me. His ability to think out of the box and come up with innovative/unconventional ideas to solve any technical problem is amazing. It has been a real pleasure working with him and I would recommend anybody running short of ideas to talk to him just once. He brings enormous value and greatly enrichens the quality of any technical discussion

testimonials.name: Ranjith Krishnan
testimonials.quote: Very strong technical skills and experience; Solid architectural background; very pleasant to work with; Excellent collaborator; Always ready to help and guide others; very dedicated to the work he does.

testimonials.name: Kartik Pandya
testimonials.quote: Palani is very well respected for his technical abilities and sincerity for work. Palani is very approachable. Other developers seek Palani's help and guidance in technical areas. Palani has made many key contributions to the organization and his advice and support are invaluable to me in making key decisions.
